pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, April 8, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Hamilton, Ontario

Private meetings 

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of Kuwait, His Highness Sheikh Sabah Khalid Al-Hamad Al-Sabah.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland will meet with local families and make an announcement highlighting Budget 2022 investments in housing. Minister of Housing and Diversity and Inclusion Ahmed Hussen, Minister of Public Services and Procurement Filomena Tassi, and Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Karina Gould will also be in attendance. A media availability will follow.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with members of the local Ukrainian community. Minister of Housing and Diversity and Inclusion Ahmed Hussen, Minister of Public Services and Procurement Filomena Tassi, and Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Karina Gould will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity 
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
